name: film_category
summary: A junction table linking films to their respective categories.
purpose: To bridge the many-to-many relationship between films and categories. It allows a single film to be associated with multiple categories (e.g., 'Action', 'Comedy') and a single category to contain many different films, preventing data duplication.
dependencies_thoughts: Relates to the `film` table (film_id to film_id) and the `category` table (category_id to category_id). Records here depend on the existence of IDs in both parent tables.

columns.description: The numerical identifier of the film. This is part of the composite primary key and a foreign key referencing the 'film' table.
The numerical identifier of the category. This is part of the composite primary key and a foreign key referencing the 'category' table.
Timestamp indicating the last time this film-category association was updated. Defaults to the current time.
